import React from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; export default function ProductDetailsAdmin() { const location = useLocation(); const product = location.state; const saving = parseInt((product.save / 100) * product.price); const finalPrice = parseInt(product.price - (saving)); let content; return ( <>
GetYourJewellery Back to Items

{product.name}

By {product.dealer} | Product Code: {product.id}

Material used: {product.material} & {product.metal}

M.R.P : ₹ {product.price} ₹{finalPrice}

Discount: ₹ {saving} {product.save}% OFF
{content}
) }
